data.title: Create a Personal Bio Page
data.description: Build a simple HTML page with your name, a short bio, and a profile image. Use semantic HTML5 tags like <header>, <main>, <article>, and <footer>.

data.title: Style Your Bio Page with CSS
data.description: Apply CSS styling to your bio page: custom fonts, colors, spacing, and a centered layout. Practice using classes and the box model.

data.title: Build a Simple Navigation Menu
data.description: Create a horizontal navigation bar with HTML and CSS. Include hover effects and ensure the active link is visually distinct.
